channel.title: Need help with decompile/deobing
channel.description:
Hi, i found this game called wurmonline and its java based like runescape and i managed to get the .jar for the client and i was wondering if someone could deob and decompile it for me, thanks!
.jar link: http://www.wurmonline.com/client/wurmclient.jar

item.title: Need help with decompile/deobing
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

The JVM has like 7 times as many memory areas than that. Do you hear it complaining? Now get back to work!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with decompile/deobing
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

Damn, I have 8000+ rectangles, any help please?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with decompile/deobing
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

omg it really works!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with decompile/deobing
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Deobbing is a piece of cake. Just get a fucking HUGE sheet of paper, divide it into rectangles, go into whatever the main class is of this thing and find "public void main(String "

Just label the divisions in the paper with the values of what every thing evaluates out to be, and then when you have enough suddenly you will realize which each part does.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with decompile/deobing
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

[quote=“CJg, post:17, topic:31179”]So, could anyone maybe decompile and deob them and put them into a .rar file and upload the and post them here/pm them to me please?

Thx, Cj.

Edit: Or pm me how to Deob them, i can decompile them, i just dont know how to deob.[/quote]

Wurm implements some interesting protections, hitting various things fundamental to most IDEs, the Java language, and Windows itself (not sure if there’s anything *nix-specific). It also looks like it might incorporate some fairly subtle control flow alterations. I’ve seen papers describing some of these specific techniques (as well as the overall ‘obfuscation’ philosophy he seems to subscribe to), but as far as I know there aren’t any tools to remove them.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with decompile/deobing
item.dc:creator: @CJg CJg
item.description:
@CJg wrote:

So, could anyone maybe decompile and deob them and put them into a .rar file and upload the and post them here/pm them to me please?

Thx, Cj.

Edit: Or pm me how to Deob them, i can decompile them, i just dont know how to deob.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with decompile/deobing
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“1337h4x, post:8, topic:31179”]WTF? [quote]No definitions were found for mojang.

Suggestions:

  • Make sure all words are spelled correctly.
  • Search the Web for documents that contain “mojang”[/quote]

[quote=your sig]If you are a Chinese RuneScape cheater and posses knowledge of a RuneScape bot for the new engine, please contact me.
与我联系如果您认识或有RuneScape bot 。[/quote] well way to publicize, faggot.[/quote]

It’s Chinese asking for any info on the RuneScape bot for the new rs engine. It’s VERY public knowledge that Chinese are cheating rs.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with decompile/deobing
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

[quote=“Iamadam, post:12, topic:31179”]A) They aren’t going to follow the server logs to a site. And even if they do, I doubt they’ll sign up and monitor out activity.
B) We hardly ‘publicized’ it. We merely mentioned hacking it.[/quote]

Next deep scan, a Google search for “wurm online cheat” might lead here.

Iamadam:

D) Hacking the game will alert the creator anyway. What’s a bit of talk going to do?

Not necessarily, though Shadow makes a good point about community size. Hacking would have to be subtle.

Iamadam:

This is a Java forum. Reverse engineering java games is a great way to learn.

Yes, it is. Certainly the most fun.

Iamadam:

Back on topic: I tried the game, and it fried my default graphics card

Running Wurm hangs my system worse than an ASM fork bomb I accidentally set off yesterday.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with decompile/deobing
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

Eaxctly ^^. The only thing we can get out of it is education

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with decompile/deobing
item.dc:creator: @ShadowSyntax ShadowSyntax
item.description:
@ShadowSyntax wrote:

Cheating won’t work in wurm, the community is too small. The devs are easily able to check up on everyone, and do so regularly.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with decompile/deobing
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

A) They aren’t going to follow the server logs to a site. And even if they do, I doubt they’ll sign up and monitor out activity.
B) We hardly ‘publicized’ it. We merely mentioned hacking it.
C) Even if they do, they won’t take it very seriously (oh noes, a bunch of noobs want to hack the game)
D) Hacking the game will alert the creator anyway. What’s a bit of talk going to do?
E) There is no E.
I know you aren’t an idiot. What is the real reason for your open opposition to this harmless discussion?

I suggest you stop arguing, you’re just digging yourself a deeper hole.

Honestly… sighs
This is a Java forum. Reverse engineering java games is a great way to learn.
Back on topic: I tried the game, and it fried my default graphics card

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with decompile/deobing
item.dc:creator: @RancidKraut RancidKraut
item.description:
@RancidKraut wrote:

CJg:

Just shut up, who cares if its posted here, what is the maker of that game a runescape nerd, he gonna come here and just happen to see this topic, i dought it and acually there 4 more jars, im just to lazy to get the links for them.

No, they don’t have to browse this forum to notice. They’re not stupid. Ever heard of server logs? Referrer field leads them right to this. You may think so, but I’m not stupid.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x

item.title: Need help with decompile/deobing
item.dc:creator: @CJg CJg
item.description:
@CJg wrote:

I know, ive been trying to find someway to hack it via the client source, i used a speed hack on it that came on cheat engine, was fun for like 6 hours then they fixed it XD im pretty sure if i can get all the class files decompiled and deobed i can figure something out.

Btw, 1337hax try downloading omega drivers (If you have Ati or nVideo(or how ever u spell it) gfx cards) my laptop got owned bye wurm for a long time then i downloaded the omega drivers and it plays fine now, theres a link to the drivers on the wurm home page.

Btw thanks Scar, im gonna go through every line of it XD

Edit: iamadam, yes it is an MMORPG if you manage to hack it pm me =p

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with decompile/deobing
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

A graphics card like nVidia GeForce 2, ATI Radeon or comparable, with recent drivers and at least 32 MB Video RAM (128 MB recommended)

Thats one hard core java game.

I remember trying to play it, and then my laptop kept gettin pwnd by it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with decompile/deobing
